title: Gateway login does not pick up credentials if the main connection is picking up default credential from option.
author: McAtkin
body_snippet:
Default credentials in options are not passed to the gateway login when "use the same username and password" is set on the gateway credentials option

## Expected Behavior
The default credentials are passed to the gateway login if its set to use the same credentials as the main connection

## Current Behavior
No credentials are sent to the gateway and a login box pops up for every connection.

## Possible Solution
2 possible solutions.  

1 put a default gateway credentials into optio...
